structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Whenever the legislative body of any city or the fiscal court of any county or one (1) of them in conjunction with a school district establishes a supervised park, playground and recreation system as provided in KRS 97.010 to KRS 97.040, or jointly, as provided in KRS 97.035, the legislative body or the fiscal court or other authority participating may appropriate money out of the general fund of the city or county or other authority for the purpose of expanding, equipping, maintaining and operating such park, playground or recreation center.
law.history: Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 6, effective June 19, 1958. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3909a-6.
